author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Brian Kemp Leads David Perdue in Tight Governor's Primary Race

author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Brian Kemp Leads David Perdue in Tight Governor's Primary Race

sentence: Three percent of respondents backed right-wing candidate Kandiss Taylor, who remains in a distant third place, and another 15 percent said they were undecided or had no opinion.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Kemp Holds Lead over Perdue in Governor's Race; Herschel Walker Dominates Senate Primary

author: Ashley Oliver

sentence: Third-place candidate Kandiss Taylor received four percent, and 15 percent of respondents said they were undecided.

title: Georgia Poll: Kemp Widens Lead over Perdue in Governor's Primary
